pullrequest.title: Make machines bring VPN interfaces back up on reboot

content.raw:
For a little better reading I'd suggest using the cat << EOF approach instead of each line individually.

```
$ cat << EOF > /tmp/test.out
asdf
fdsa
EOF
$ cat /tmp/test.out 
asdf
fdsa
```

It also might make sense to pipe it into the file, and then explicitly execute the file instead of duplicating the content.
